original_text: But while he was still alive, he gave gifts to the sons of his slave wives. He sent these sons away to the land of the east. He wanted to keep them far away from Isaac.
korean_text: 자기 서자들에게도 재산을 주어 자기 생전에 그들로 하여금 자기 아들 이삭을 떠나 동방 곧 동쪽 땅으로 가게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: But while he was still alive
he gave gifts to the sons of his slave wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 첩들의 아들들에게 선물을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: to the land of the east
He wanted to keep them far away from Isaac
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들을 이삭에게서 멀리 떨어뜨리고 싶었습니다
